short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provide crime maps for Airbnb, Redfin, Zillow...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maptension helps to find safe neighborhoods when searching on Airbnb, Redfin and Zillow. Maptension provides thematic crime maps along the regular search maps in Airbnb, Redfin and Zillow.
